main_question: Who were the Group of Seven in modern Canada?
possible_answers: B. A group of Canadian companies
C. A group of cowboys who defended Canada
D. A group of Canadian landscape painters in the 1920s
answer: D. A group of Canadian landscape painters in the 1920s
explanatory_sentence: In the visual arts, Canada is historically perhaps best known for the Group of Seven, founded in 1920, who developed a style of painting to capture the rugged wilderness landscapes.
